name: FPL Captain
description: FPLCaptain is your all-in-one Fantasy Premier League companion, built for managers who want to stay ahead every Gameweek. Track live ranks, rivals, captain picks, fixture difficulty, and player stats — all powered by smart analytics and AI. Whether you’re chasing mini-league glory or climbing the global leaderboard, FPLCaptain gives you the insights and tools you need to make smarter decisions, faster.

currentProject.name: Harout
